sources.title: False Pretenses (1935) COMEDY ROMANCE
sources.description:
Stars: Irene Ware, Sidney Blackmer, Betty Compson
Director: Charles Lamont

A girl who's just lost her job meets a drunk millionaire on a bridge who's just lost his money. They go back to his house, and devise a plan: he'll teach her how to be a lady, and then introduce her to his rich friends so she can snag a husband, and then she'll pay him a finder's fee.

metadata.Plot: A girl who's just lost her job meets a drunk millionaire on a bridge who's just lost his money. They go back to his house, and eventually come up with a plan to benefit them both: he'll scrounge enough money together to teach her how to be a lady, and then introduce her to his rich friends so she can snag a husband, after which she'll pay him a finder's fee. Complications ensue.
metadata.Actors: Irene Ware, Sidney Blackmer, Betty Compson
